hero.title: The Old Crown Girton: Historic Thatched Pub & Authentic Nepalese Restaurant
hero.subtitle: Welcome to Girton's unique dining destination, where the largest thatched pub in the country serves exceptional Nepalese cuisine alongside beloved British pub classics.
hero.description: Just minutes from Cambridge and Girton College, we're your family-friendly, dog-welcoming village hub for memorable meals and community gathering.

hero.title: About Old Crown Girton
hero.subtitle: A unique blend of authentic Nepalese cuisine and traditional British pub culture

story.title: Our Story
story.introduction: Located in the picturesque village of Girton, just minutes from Cambridge, Old Crown Girton is set in England's largest thatched pub. We serve authentic Nepalese cuisine alongside traditional British pub classics for a warm, welcoming village experience. While we don't currently serve a traditional Sunday roast in Cambridge, our Nepalese dishes and pub favourites make comforting Sunday roast alternatives.

timeline.title: The Village Heart
timeline.description: For centuries, The Old Crown has been at the heart of Girton village life. Our historic thatched building - recognized as the largest thatched pub in the country - has witnessed countless community gatherings and celebrations.

timeline.title: Culinary Evolution
timeline.description: Under various managements, The Old Crown experimented with different culinary directions, including a period as an upscale gastropub. Each era added to our rich tapestry while maintaining our essential village pub character.

timeline.title: The Nepalese-British Fusion
timeline.description: Under current management, we've discovered our unique identity: combining authentic Nepalese cuisine with traditional British pub classics. This fusion represents Cambridge's multicultural community while honoring our heritage.

cta.title: Ready to Book?

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.text: Absolutely wonderful! The Nepalese dishes are authentic and delicious, and the traditional pub atmosphere is so welcoming. Perfect for families.

items.name: Mike Thompson
items.text: Great food and fantastic service. The best of both worlds - proper pub classics and amazing curry. Highly recommended!

items.question: Do you accept bookings?
items.answer: Yes, we accept bookings online or by phone. We recommend booking in advance, especially for weekends and special events.

items.question: Are you family-friendly?
items.answer: Absolutely! We welcome families with children until 9pm. We have a children's menu and high chairs available.

items.question: Do you offer takeaway?
items.answer: Yes, we offer takeaway for both our Nepalese and British menu items. Call us on 01223277217 to place your order.

items.question: Is parking available?
items.answer: Yes, we have free parking available for our customers.

slides.alt: Festive Christmas table setting with decorations at The Old Crown Girton
slides.headline: Celebrate Christmas at Old Crown Girton
slides.copy: Gather your guests for a four-course festive meal with mulled wine or another welcome drink included for every arrival.

slides.alt: Festive Nepalese curry dishes served alongside Christmas carollers
slides.headline: Two Magical Nights of Curry & Carols
slides.copy: Join us on 16 & 17 December for a GBP 35 Nepalese banquet with live carols beneath our thatched roof ‚Äî limited seats, joyful choruses.

slides.alt: A trio of sports cars parked outside the thatched Old Crown Girton pub on a sunny day
slides.headline: A Perfect Stop for Road-Trip Meets
slides.copy: Pull up, park, and enjoy great food and drinks ‚Äî our spacious forecourt and thatched backdrop make every car meet an easy, welcoming occasion.

slides.alt: Electric vehicles charging at dedicated bays outside the Old Crown Girton pub
slides.headline: Plug In While You Unwind Inside
slides.copy: Top up your EV and your energy in one stop ‚Äî enjoy dinner or a pint while our on-site chargers handle your car.

slides.alt: Historic restaurant interior dining room at Old Crown Girton
slides.headline: Authentic Nepalese Dining in a Characterful Setting
slides.copy: Experience exceptional Nepalese cuisine in our cosy dining room ‚Äî perfect for family meals and celebrations.

slides.alt: Comfortable bar lounge with armchairs and TV for sports viewing at Old Crown Girton
slides.headline: Live Sports, Craft Beer & Community Spirit
slides.copy: Watch the big games in comfort with friends ‚Äî a welcoming atmosphere for locals and visitors alike.

slides.alt: Stylish pub restaurant dining area interior at Old Crown Girton
slides.headline: Sophisticated Atmosphere for Special Occasions
slides.copy: Traditional pub charm with contemporary comfort ‚Äî ideal for date nights and celebrations.

slides.alt: Cosy pub bar area with games machine at Old Crown Girton
slides.headline: Relaxed Bar Lounge for Every Occasion
slides.copy: Grab a pint, catch up with friends, and settle into our welcoming atmosphere with traditional pub games.

slides.alt: Fans watching live Premier League football on a big screen inside a pub in Girton
slides.headline: Catch Premier League & Major Matches Live
slides.copy: Join us for Premier League, football, rugby and headline sporting events on our big screen ‚Äî the best place to watch the match in Girton and Cambridge.

slides.alt: Family-friendly pub garden with picnic tables at Old Crown Girton
slides.headline: Room to Unwind in Our Beer Garden
slides.copy: Plenty of space for groups, families, and lazy weekend afternoons with traditional picnic table seating.

slides.alt: Spacious beer garden with outdoor seating at Old Crown Girton
slides.headline: Outdoor Dining in Our Spacious Beer Garden
slides.copy: Enjoy fresh air and great food in our expansive outdoor space ‚Äî perfect for summer dining.

slides.alt: Sunny pub garden patio seating and terrace at Old Crown Girton
slides.headline: Al Fresco Dining on Our Sunny Terrace
slides.copy: Relax with weekend lunches and summer drinks on our spacious, sun-drenched terrace.

slides.alt: Children's wooden play area with slide in pub garden at Old Crown Girton
slides.headline: Dedicated Children's Play Area for Family Fun
slides.copy: Let the kids play safely while you relax. Our secure wooden play area keeps families smiling.

slides.alt: Historic thatched exterior of Old Crown Girton - England's largest thatched pub
slides.headline: England's Largest Thatched Pub ‚Äî A Cambridge Landmark
slides.copy: Discover our remarkable thatched building ‚Äî a unique setting minutes from Cambridge and Girton College.

slides.alt: The Old Crown pub exterior and beer garden view
slides.headline: Traditional Pub Charm with Modern Amenities
slides.copy: Beautiful exterior showcasing our historic character alongside our expansive garden facilities.

slides.alt: Large gravel car park with ample free parking at Old Crown Girton
slides.headline: No Parking Worries ‚Äî Plenty of Space
slides.copy: Unlike city centre, enjoy stress-free dining with our large, free car park.
